about_the_game:
Nautikins

The Nautikins have evolved from a species similar to dolphins to inherit the planet after untold eons. They swim in a vast ocean and explore unique islands. Hire crews of Nautikins to operate your boats and more! See the full game store page for features.

Features limited in the demo

  • Only 3 islands (1 is small)

  • 5 Nautikins instead of the full list

  • 1 save "Demo"

  • Only 34 parts

  • Only 1 available activity type "Delivery"

  • Only sandbox mode, no campaign

  • No aircraft parts or runway, but unlimited ships

  • No buy shacks for additional items

  • No structure / base building

  • No part groups

  • No bots

  • No multiplayer

  • No mods

  • No Steam workshop

The "Demo" save will create or load automatically when you click "Singpleplayer" from the main menu. It can be renamed to whatever you want and continued with the full game.
detailed_description:
Nautikins

The Nautikins have evolved from a species similar to dolphins to inherit the planet after untold eons. They swim in a vast ocean and explore unique islands. Hire crews of Nautikins to operate your boats and more! See the full game store page for features.

Features limited in the demo

  • Only 3 islands (1 is small)

  • 5 Nautikins instead of the full list

  • 1 save "Demo"

  • Only 34 parts

  • Only 1 available activity type "Delivery"

  • Only sandbox mode, no campaign

  • No aircraft parts or runway, but unlimited ships

  • No buy shacks for additional items

  • No structure / base building

  • No part groups

  • No bots

  • No multiplayer

  • No mods

  • No Steam workshop

The "Demo" save will create or load automatically when you click "Singpleplayer" from the main menu. It can be renamed to whatever you want and continued with the full game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Proton 7.0
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Support via Proton, no stand alone Linux build currently
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS, Proton Latest
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 7.1, 7.1 Emulated
  • Additional Notes: AMD specs are based on approximation with Windows listed above (Intel, Nvidia, etc.)

name: Nautikin Adventures Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Direct X 11.1 or better is required, but the game will run in compatibility with 11.0 (Windows 7)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 7.1 or 7.1 emulated

short_description: You are the Nautikins, the dominant species on this ocean planet! Build vessels to explore a vast ocean! This is the demo version of the game.
